name: AssignUserLinkedObject
description:
Assign a primary user to an associated user in Okta.

Use this tool to assign a primary user relationship to an associated user in Okta. If the associated user already has a different primary user for this relationship, the previous link will be removed, ensuring only one primary user per associated user.

parameters.name: user_id_or_login
parameters.description: ID or login of the associated user. Use 'me' for the current session user.

value_schema.description:
If for the `self` link, this is the ID of the user for whom you want to get the primary user ID. If for the `associated` relation, this is the user ID or login value of the user assigned the associated relationship.

This can be `me` to represent the current session user.

parameters.name: primary_relationship_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the primary relationship to assign to the associated user.

value_schema.description: Name of the `primary` relationship being assigned

parameters.name: primary_user_id
parameters.description: User ID to assign as the `primary` relationship for the `associated` user. Provide the specific user ID.

value_schema.description: User ID to be assigned to the `primary` relationship for the `associated` user
